dcterms:creator: D. Anguita
A. Ghio
L. Oneto
X. Parra
J. L. Reyes-Ortiz
dcterms:description: The HAR database contains accelerometer and gyroscope recordings of 30 individuals while performing activities of daily living (ADL) such as walking, walking upstairs, walking downstairs, sitting, standing, and laying. The data was collected at 50Hz from a Samsung Galaxy SII phone attached to the user's waist.
dcterms:title: Human Activity Recognition database (HAR)

dcterms:description: Dataset of accelerometer traces collected using smartphones of users doing their daily activities.
dcterms:title: Accelerometer traces (collected using smartphones)

dcterms:description: Data from users doing their daily activities used for training the model.
dcterms:title: Data from users doing their daily activities
